settings.content: Palo Alto Theme by [Page Mill Design](http://www.pagemilldesign.com)

Please review the [documentation](http://www.pagemilldesign.com/palo-alto-theme), post on the theme's own [subreddit](http://reddit.com/r/paloaltotheme), or contact us at [support@pagemilldesign.com](mailto:support@pagemilldesign.com) if you require support.

settings.info: Defined in pixels. Do not add the 'px' unit.

settings.label: Choose blog to show recent article excerpts

settings.info: Hidden on mobile devices

settings.label: Choose a page to show content from
Show newsletter signup
settings.info: Configure newsletter settings in the Newsletter section.

settings.label: Choose a delay until popup appears
Choose a duration until popup reappears
settings.info: Popups can detract from a user's experience, so try to limit how often they appear.

settings.content: Choose your home page sections and their order
Each section can only be used once on the home page

settings.label: Link URL
settings.info: https://vimeo.com/123456789
A full banner image or video can be shown, but not both.

settings.label: Full banner image
settings.info: 2048px width recommended
A full banner image or video can be shown, but not both.

settings.label: Link URL
settings.info: YouTube or Vimeo links only. 2048px width recommended.

settings.label: Video ratio
settings.info: This parameter is used to trim any black space bordering the video.

settings.label: Fallback image
settings.info: This image will display while the video is loading and in place of the video on mobile devices for compatibility reasons.

settings.label: Choose a page to show content from
Link URL
settings.info: The above image must first be shown to enable this feature. YouTube or Vimeo links only.

settings.label: Image
settings.info: 2048px width recommended
Either an Instagram feed or an image can be shown, but not both.

settings.label: Instagram Access Token
settings.info: [Get your access token](http://pagemilldesign.com/instagram-privacy-policy)

settings.label: Instagram Username
settings.info: Do not include the @ symbol

settings.label: MailChimp form action URL
settings.info: Leave blank to use default signup form. [Find your MailChimp form action URL](http://docs.shopify.com/support/configuration/store-customization/where-do-i-get-my-mailchimp-form-action).

settings.info: https://www.facebook.com/shopify

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://docs.shopify.com/support/settings/general/tell-my-script-where-to-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.
